factoryName.metadata: Nombre de instancia de Data Factory

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 'STG_BEG_FACT_TOTAL_EXEMPLARS' AS TAULA
      ,'@{concat(substring(pipeline().parameters.Data_Carrega,0,4),'-',substring(pipeline().parameters.Data_Carrega,4,2))}' AS DATA_CARREGA
      , 'ERROR' AS ESTAT
      , '@{replace(replace(string(activity('STG_BEG_TOTAL_EXEMPLARS').output.errors[0].Message),'''',''),'"','')}' AS ERROR
      ,getdate() AS DATA_INSERCIO

activities.name: Get_FITCHEROS_A_CARGAR
activities.description: Cogemos el nombre de todos los archivos que hay que cargar para poder iterar en ellos a posterior.

activities.name: ForEach
activities.description: Para cara fichero, hacemos el copy data correspondiente en la tabla STG_BEG_FACT_PRESTECS

activities.name: Set_FITCHEROS_A_CARGAR
activities.description: Metemos lo obtenido en la variable V_FICHEROS_A_CARGAR

activities.name: Filter_FITCHEROS_A_CARGAR
activities.description: Filtramos por los ficheros que queremos.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CODI_BIBLIOTECA as string,
		DESC_BIBLIOTECA as string,
		ID_AGENCY as string,
		TERMINAL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STGDimAutoprestecs
STGDimAutoprestecs sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CODI_BIBLIOTECA as string,
		DESC_BIBLIOTECA as string,
		ID_AGENCY as string,
		TERMINAL as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> ODSDimAutoprestecs

source(output(
		CODI_BIBLIOTECA as string,
		ID_AGENCY as string,
		TERMINAL as string,
		LOCATION as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STGDimLocations
STGDimLocations sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CODI_BIBLIOTECA as string,
		ID_AGENCY as string,
		TERMINAL as string,
		LOCATION as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> ODSDimLocations
